goal.en: Optical imaging, one branch of medical imaging technology, addresses the imaging issues that employ electro-magnetic wave as a source and reconstruct images. Those reconstructed images reflect and illustrate the changing inherent characteristics of the object under investigation. The course delivers and discusses the fundamental basis, imaging software and hardware of the considered optical imaging modalities, including basic principles, optical information measurement, image computation/reconstruction and imaging system validation. The content contains (1) Introduction to medical imaging techniques, (2) Briefing on radiative and non-radiative medical imaging modalities, and (3) Diffuse optical tomography.
goal.ch: 光學造影是造影技術的分支領域，討論光學成像在影像技術所需知識；本課程為探討醫學影像相關的光學基礎及成像軟硬體知識。本課程著重在講述光學造影技術的物理原理、光資訊量測、影像計算、及系統驗證 等。授課內容分成(1)醫學造影綜論、(2)游離輻射及非游離輻射造影技術分類及講述；(3)擴散光學造影技術原理 等三部分。透過所規劃課程內容，讓本系光機電專長領域學生，分別在(i)光學成像/電磁波物理機制(光)；(ii)掃描機台設計控制、影像計算、及仿體驗證(機)；以及(iii)光電量測及訊號處理(電) 等課題，獲得統整學習。

content.en:
1. (Topic 1) Introduction to medical imaging techniques (2 weeks)
2. (Topic 2) Briefing on radiative and non-radiative medical imaging modalities (7 weeks)
Radiation Physics (2 weeks), mammography (1 week), CT (1 week), OCT (1.5 weeks), PAT (1.5 weeks)
3. (Topic 3) Diffuse optical tomography, basic principles on (7 weeks)
* Radiation transport mechanisms (Boltzmann radiation transport Eq., photon diffusion in tissues, etc.)
* Tomographic system- hardware (mechanical scanning device, measurement system and data acquisition)
* Tomographic system- software (finite element modeling for computing the optical coefficients of tissues/ phantoms, inverse computation with iteration schemes)
* Experimentation issues on system calibration
4. Exam and Project oral presentation (2 weeks)
content.ch:
課程內容分成(1)醫學造影綜論、(2)游離輻射(如X光、CT)、及非游離輻射(如近紅外光)造影技術分類講述；(3)擴散光學造影(Diffuse Optical Imaging, DOI)技術原理 等三部分。說明如下:
(1) 主題1— 醫學造影綜論簡介醫學影像種類。 (2週)
(2) 主題2— 游離及非游離輻射造影的影像物理及成像技術講述，將重點說明X光影像, CT, Optical Coherence Tomography (OCT), 及Photoacoustic Tomography (PAT) 的成像原理、功能/限制、及應用範疇 等。 (7週)
(3) 主題3— 對於DOI造影技術申論，課程中講授光波在組織中擴散/吸收機制、訊號量測原理、以及光學係數反算數值方法、仿體驗證、及系統校正 等；說明光波在生理組織之吸收、擴散與散射等傳遞與交互作用現象，藉由實驗量測與數值運算，獲得不同生理組織光學係數特性，進而用以分辨組織差異而用以作醫學診斷工具。 (7週)
學期考試及報告。 (2週)
